cause its free and i paid for it, i feel like a fool

I have been playing CS GO since its very release in 2012, which was a fascinating adventure for me and my friends. Winning your first matchmaking game, cluthing the rounds as the whole team relies on you and even your first cheeky knife kill - all of these things bring a smile to my face as I look back on the memories.

However, as the time has progressed it seems as though valve have completely given up on the game, the tick rate on the official matchmaking servers is terrible with hits on the enemies not regestering sometimes, cranky updates and unnecessary changes are what have ruined the Counter Strike for me.

Valve needs to stop worrying about milking this wondeful game with more cases and operations coming out as it seems monthly now and actually adress the issues the game has. No doubt people will still play, and definetly they will still enjoy it as it is an absolute classic, nonetheless it just saddens me to see one of my favourite competitive games being treated like a mobile game with lootboxes.
